meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jim Costello Barbara-Anne Eddy Judy Flannery Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #791.

div.div:
Barbara-Anne Eddy game 1.
Final Jeopardy! logo flashes on the game board's monitors instead of the show's logo.

td.p: Jim Costello, a high school English teacher from Long Beach, California
Barbara-Anne Eddy, a freelance researcher from Vancouver, Canada
Judy Flannery, a homemaker from Eugene, Oregon (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,800)

tr.td: PARIS
PETES & PETERS
PUNS
POTENT POTABLES
POETRY
POTPOURRI
(Alex: And if you get the impression that we've fallen into a vat of "P"s, you're absolutely right!)

')

tr.td: Judy
Barbara-Anne

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Judy
Barbara-Anne
Jim
PRESIDENTS
(Alex: Once again, we've got a lot of "P"s.)
PROVERBS
PREHISTORIC TIMES
PBS
PULITZER PRIZE PLAYS
PHYSICS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_1', 'clue_DJ_1_1_stuck', '(Judy: Who is Lyndon Baines Johnson?)
(Alex: Oh no, sorry. You forgot about [*], who came after. Alright Judy, you\'re at -$400, and you retain control of the board. Go again.)

Gerald Ford

Judy
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_4_2', 'clue_DJ_4_2_stuck', '(Barbara-Anne: What is "Masterpiece Theatre"?)
(Alex: Oh sorry. If you had thought about the children being up and watching in the morning, you would\'ve perhaps thought of [*].)
[Barbara-Anne mouths the correct response.]
(Alex: Alright, that knocks you down to $1,000; start building again.)

"Sesame Street"

Barbara-Anne
')

tr.td: Judy
Barbara-Anne

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Judy, as she shakes her head] Well, he\'s a pop artist and he\'s certainly successful, but he is not the right response.)
...
(Alex: [To Barbara-Anne] You remember The Beatles, Wings, 2 duet al--duet numbers, and 1 solo for a total of 29. How much did you bet? [Barbara-Anne mouths "Everything" as her wager is revealed.] You\'re gonna double it and go to $11,200.)
JudyWho is Phil Collins?
$2,600
Barbara-AnneWho is Paul McCartney?
$5,600
JimWho is Willie Nelson?
$5,500
Paul McCartney')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Solo or in a duet or group, this artist has had more Billboard #1 hits than any other, 29 in all')

tr.td: POP MUSIC
Solo or in a duet or group, this artist has had more Billboard #1 hits than any other, 29 in all
Judy
Barbara-Anne
Jim
3rd place: a Vita-Vac vaccum cleaner
New champion: $11,200
2nd place: a Roper range + Regal cookware
Judy
Barbara-Anne
Jim

10 R,
2 W
(including 1 DD)

22 R
(including 1 DD),
5 W
(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
